item.title: LEAD GENERATION
item.description: Leverages best practices in cold-calling, email and social media in order to maximize all new leads coming in from the top of the [lead generation] funnel. Leverages systemic outbound approaches, via account-based prospecting, in order to engage various levels of the organizations with their key goals in mind. Outbound outreach includes anywhere between 8-14 steps, with messaging tailored towards different goals at each touch point, to maximize interactions and provide commercial insight that opens up future conversation.

item.title: LEAD SOURCING
item.description: Uses lead sourcing to predictably add new leads to the top of the lead generation funnel. Pays very close attention to the number of new leads entering the pipeline, along with the quality of each lead. Takes note of stakeholder(s), industry and/or use case to proactively reach out to similar prospects via outbound outreach. Very cost-effective at leveraging and combining lead sourcing and sales technology. Constantly up-to-date with market activity and always refining lead sourcing strategy accordingly.
